item.title: 10 Movies On Netflix’s 2025 Release Schedule That Could Become Massive Hits
item.description: Between March and December 2025, some of the biggest movies Netflix has ever premiered will be dropping on the streaming platform. What are they?

item.title: 10 Emotional Dramas To Watch If You Loved Tom Hanks' Here
item.description: After watching Tom Hanks’ time-bending 2024 drama, Here, audiences should check out these other unique and emotional stories about family and love.

item.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About The Boy Review - Peacock's Renée Zellweger Sequel Reminds Me Why The Modern Rom-Com Genre Still Struggles
item.description: Bridget Jones is back this Valentine's Day, and while Renée Zellweger is captivating, the original energy of Bridget Jones is nowhere to be found.
